alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Independence; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 12:22AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stone, western Independence and northern Cleburne Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1222 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greers Ferry, or near Fairfield Bay, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Heber Springs... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Concord... Moorefield... Higden... Salado... Southside in Independence Count... Bethesda... Ben... Almond... Desha... Ida... Brownsville... Locust Grove... Huff... Narrows Marina... Brewer... Woodrow... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for north central Arkansas.
